articles.title: How to Reset Your Password
articles.summary: Step-by-step guide to reset your account password
articles.content:
To reset your password:

1. Go to the login page
2. Click 'Forgot Password' link
3. Enter your email address
4. Check your email for a reset link
5. Click the link and follow instructions
6. Create a new strong password

If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, check your spam folder or contact support.

articles.title: Understanding Your Bill
articles.summary: Explanation of billing charges and payment methods
articles.content:
Your monthly bill includes:

**Base Subscription**: Your plan fee
**Usage Charges**: Additional services used
**Taxes**: Applicable local taxes
**Credits**: Any discounts or refunds

**Payment Methods**:
- Credit/Debit cards
- Bank transfer
- PayPal
- Corporate invoicing (Enterprise only)

**Billing Cycle**: Bills are generated on the same date each month. Payment is due within 30 days.

**Questions?** Contact billing support for detailed explanations.

articles.title: Troubleshooting Connection Issues
articles.content:
If you're experiencing connection issues:

**Quick Fixes**:
1. Check your internet connection
2. Refresh your browser (Ctrl+F5)
3. Clear browser cache and cookies
4. Try a different browser
5. Disable browser extensions temporarily

**Advanced Troubleshooting**:
1. Check firewall settings
2. Verify DNS settings
3. Try incognito/private browsing mode
4. Restart your router/modem
5. Contact your ISP if issues persist

**Still having problems?** Contact technical support with:
- Your browser version
- Operating system
- Error messages (screenshots helpful)
- Time when issue occurred

articles.title: Managing Your Account Settings
articles.summary: How to update profile, preferences, and privacy settings
articles.content:
To manage your account settings:

**Profile Information**:
1. Go to Settings > Profile
2. Update name, email, phone number
3. Upload profile picture
4. Save changes

**Notification Preferences**:
1. Go to Settings > Notifications
2. Choose email/SMS preferences
3. Set frequency (immediate, daily, weekly)
4. Select notification types

**Privacy Settings**:
1. Go to Settings > Privacy
2. Control data sharing preferences
3. Manage third-party integrations
4. Set profile visibility

**Security Settings**:
1. Enable two-factor authentication
2. Review active sessions
3. Update password regularly
4. Set up security questions

articles.title: API Integration Guide
articles.summary: How to integrate with our REST API
articles.content:
Getting started with our API:

**Authentication**:
1. Generate API key in Settings > API
2. Include in header: `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY`
3. All requests must use HTTPS

**Base URL**: `https://api.yourservice.com/v1`

**Common Endpoints**:
- `GET /users` - List users
- `POST /tickets` - Create ticket
- `GET /tickets/{id}` - Get ticket details
- `PUT /tickets/{id}` - Update ticket

**Rate Limits**:
- Basic: 100 requests/hour
- Premium: 1000 requests/hour
- Enterprise: 10000 requests/hour

**Error Handling**:
- 400: Bad Request
- 401: Unauthorized
- 403: Forbidden
- 429: Rate Limited
- 500: Server Error

**SDKs Available**:
- Python
- JavaScript/Node.js
- PHP
- Java
- C#

Full documentation: https://docs.yourservice.com/api
